thread.title: Akshay Kumar’s Jolly LLB 2 becomes the third highest Valentine’s day grosser after Ranveer Singh’s Gunday and Ranbir Kapoor’s Roy
thread.title_full: Akshay Kumar’s Jolly LLB 2 becomes the third highest Valentine’s day grosser after Ranveer Singh’s Gunday and Ranbir Kapoor’s Roy

author: Karan Shah
title: Akshay Kumar’s Jolly LLB 2 becomes the third highest Valentine’s day grosser after Ranveer Singh’s Gunday and Ranbir Kapoor’s Roy
text:
Ranveer Singh, Shilpa Shetty Kundra, Preity Zinta: Celebs spotted at a Mumbai Suburban theatre 
A while ago we revealed how Akshay Kumar ‘s Jolly LLB 2 saw a jump on day 5 courtesy Valentine’s Day. The film raked in another Rs 9.07 crore to take its overall tally to Rs 66.79 crore after five days at the domestic box office. But this jump on Valentine’s Day is a very common phenomenon. Every year, we see a significant increase in the business of all the movies during Valentine’s Day . This is because couples across India go out to celebrate this special day of love and many of them end up watching movies. Over the past five years, we have seen all the films see an upward trend on February 14 and this year again, Jolly LLB 2 continued the tradition. However, which film has the highest collection on V-day? 
Well, you will be surprised to know that it is Ranveer Singh , Arjun Kapoor and Priyanka Chopra’s Gunday that leads the way for the highest Valentine’s Day grossers. It is followed by Ranbir Kapoor ‘s Roy and Akshay Kumar’s Jolly LLB 2 only manages to be at number three. Yami Gautam’s Sanam Re , Katrina Kaif’s Fitoor and Kareena Kapoor Khan ‘s Ek Main Aur Ekk Tu make up the remaining part of the list. Check out the highest Valentine’s day grossers right here: 
Coming back to Jolly LLB 2 , the movie has been performing well at the box office and we expect it continue its magical run. The film might easily touch the Rs 75 crore mark by the end of week one. However, with Rana Daggubati and Taapsee Paanu ‘s The Ghazi Attack releasing this Friday, the movie will face some stiff competition over the weekend. But we still expect the film to touch the Rs 100 crore mark in its lifetime run. ALSO READ – Jolly LLB 2 box office collection day 5: Akshay Kumar’s film witnesses a jump, earns Rs 66.79 crore 
For those of you who don’t know, the movie is about Jolly a.k.a Jagdishwar Mishra (Akshay), a clumsy lawyer, who comes face to face with corruption and politics as he fights the most crucial court case of his career. The movie has managed to impress the critics as well as the public. However, will it be able to beat Shah Rukh Khan ‘s Raees and become the highest grosser of 2017? Well, stay tuned to BollywoodLife as we get you all the box office updates about the movie right here. Published: February 15, 2017 3:41 pm Topics:
